ygData.subject: RE: Honeycombs
ygData.msgSnippet: It s for the Glowing Stein quest (500-600pp now on xegony) You need 4 items - kiola nut and honeyjum is 2 of them. Go see on Allakhazam site for any quest in
ygData.messageBody:
It's for the Glowing Stein quest (500-600pp now on xegony)
You need 4 items - kiola nut and honeyjum is 2 of them.

Go see on Allakhazam site for any quest in the game

everquest.gamestats.com


Well, guess ill be in misty thicket bashing pixies.

Neran GoldenLeaf
Xegony

----Original Message Follows----
From: Sean.Clark@...
Honeycombs are found off of Bixies and Bixie Drones. These little guys are
prolly like lvl 2 -4 ...certainly none that I can remember higher than
5....I was collecting them last week and selling them for one plat
each...made a bundle of $$ that way (wee at least for a lvl 8 character
:)they are used for making Honeyjum....and , I think for another quest...but
after selling a bunch of the honeycomb I began wondering why it was so
valuable...and I STILL don't understand why people are paying such an
outrageous amount of $$ for it!!
Anybody know the answer to this puzzle
